title: Ineos Grenadiers in Transition: Searching for Sponsors – and Success – in the ‘Super Team’ Era
content:
The Ineos Grenadiers re-boot has now become an annual ritual. Amid talk of an urgency to 'win races' and a hunt for new sponsors, Jeremy Whittle wonders how much time they really have left.

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers in Transition: Searching for Sponsors – and Success – in the ‘Super Team’ Era on Velo.
author: ahood
